test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: 1. Login to the application using Selenium WebDriver 2. Extract the cookie named 'orangehrm' after successful login 3. Store the cookie value for subsequent API requests

test-method.name: GetLogin
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/auth/login' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Print and verify the response status code and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK) and response is HTML page

test-method.name: GetEmpActionSummary
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/action-summary' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not include any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: GetDashboardShortcut
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/shortcuts' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not provide any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and body for verification 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: GetEmpLeaveInfo
test-method.description: 1. Generate the current date dynamically in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format 2. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/leaves?date={current_date}' endpoint with a valid cookie 3. Do not include any request body (null) 4. Log the date used, response status code, and response body 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: GetEmpSubunit
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/subunit' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not provide any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and response body for validation 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: PutEmpName
test-method.description: Precondition: Retrieve the pay grade ID using getPayGradeid() 1. Construct the endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/pay-grades/{id}' dynamically using the retrieved ID 2. Create a JSON request body with name as 'abcde' 3. Send a PUT request with the constructed endpoint, valid cookie, and request body 4. Print the response status code and body for verification 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: PostEmpStatus
test-method.description: 1. Generate a unique employment status name using the current timestamp 2. Create a JSON request body with the generated name 3. Send a POST request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' endpoint with a valid cookie and request body 4. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 5. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating successful creation

test-method.name: DeleteEmp
test-method.description: Precondition: Retrieve the employment status ID using getemploymentstatusid() 1. Construct the request body with the retrieved ID in the format: {"ids": [id]} 2. Send a DELETE request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' endpoint with a valid cookie and the request body 3. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating the request was successful

test-method.name: PostEmpName
test-method.description: 1. Generate a unique job category name using a random UUID substring 2. Create a JSON request body with the generated name 3. Send a POST request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/job-categories' endpoint with a valid cookie and the request body 4. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 5. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating successful creation of the job category

test-method.name: PutEmpStatus
test-method.description: Precondition: Retrieve the employment status ID using getemploymentstatusid() 1. Construct the endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses/{id}' using the retrieved ID 2. Create a JSON request body to update the employment status name to 'abcdef' 3. Send a PUT request to the constructed endpoint with a valid cookie and the request body 4. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 5. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating successful update
